actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to progress payments for construction costs.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require that, if upon completion of the construction of waste treatment works, progress payments made pursuant to the Act exceed the Federal share of the project, the amount of such excess payments shall be deducted from revenue sharing funds due to the recipient of such overpayment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to progress payments for construction costs.
